official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit assignments or alienations of rights under pension plans pursuant to court orders for alimony or child support, and to permit the division of pension benefits under State community property law or common law.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit: (1) assignments or alienations of rights under pension plans pursuant to court orders for alimony or child support; and (2) the division of pension benefits under State community property law or common law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit assignments or alienations of rights under pension plans pursuant to court orders for alimony or child support, and to permit the division of pension benefits under State community property law or common law.
